author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Author Stephen King has contributed to many of the horror genre’s most important novels, films, and television endeavors. He’s also been a supporter of projects outside of his work. One such project, a 2024 horror movie, was praised by Stephen King for being one of the best horror movies he had seen that year. Obviously [...]

The post Stephen King Praises Horror Movie As “One Of The Best” appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Stephen King Praises Horror Movie As “One Of The Best”
